argumentText:
ARGUMENT
j

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lpfval.1 | |- X = U. J |
| 2 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( j = J -> ( limPt ` j ) = ( limPt ` J ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_unieq | |- ( j = J -> U. j = U. J ) |
| 4 | 3, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( j = J -> U. j = X ) |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_fveq12d | |- ( j = J -> ( ( limPt ` j ) ` U. j ) = ( ( limPt ` J ) ` X ) ) |
| 6 | 5, 4 | #P_eqeq12d | |- ( j = J -> ( ( ( limPt ` j ) ` U. j ) = U. j <-> ( ( limPt ` J ) ` X ) = X ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_df-perf | |- Perf = { j e. Top | ( ( limPt ` j ) ` U. j ) = U. j } |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_elrab2 | |- ( J e. Perf <-> ( J e. Top /\ ( ( limPt ` J ) ` X ) = X ) ) |
